title: Pr2Ni0.8Co0.2O4+δ impregnated La0.6Sr0.4CoO3−δ oxygen electrode for efficient CO2 electroreduction in solid oxide electrolysis cells
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,13251-13257
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01848F, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Binbin Liu, Zeming Li, Guoping Xiao, Xian-Long Du, Huichao Yao, Ruoyun Dai, Xiulin Wang, Jian-Qiang Wang, Tao Li
The impregnation of PNCO into the LSC anode can effectively improve the electrochemical performance of CO2 in high-temperature electrolysis due to the generation of PNCO nanofilms on the anode.
